School (district) : ICON (Idaho Connects Online School)
Role(s) : Administrator;
LinkedIn Profile : I have extensive experience working with marginalized populations and public speaking and school choice awareness.  

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I serve an at risk population who benefits from having a real world application that can help bridge the gap between school and career readiness.  
This applicant likes work environments that are:

	* In-Person
	* Hybrid
